import datetime

def get_day_of_week(date_string):
    (day, month, year) = map(int, date_string.split('/'))
    date = datetime.date(year, month, day)
    day_of_week = date.strftime('')
    return day_of_week

import datetime

def get_day_of_week(date_string):
    (day, month, year) = map(int, date_string.split(''))
    date = datetime.date(year, month, day)
    day_of_week = date.strftime('%A')
    return day_of_week
